summary: The diff adds a large set of new frontend UI/3D scene files and a stub Motoko backend actor, but it does not provide evidence of rerunning/fixing the build & deployment pipeline or addressing a specific build/deploy configuration issue. Several newly added user-facing features appear beyond the stated goal of only fixing build/deployment reliability.

missing_requirements.requirement: Re-run the full build and deployment process for the existing Unity-style 3D car controller app and ensure the deployment completes successfully without errors.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows new source files added; it contains no evidence of build/deploy being executed or of changes that directly ensure deployment completes and the deployed app loads without runtime issues.
evidence: <file-diff>: Added files only; no CI/deploy scripts/logs/config changes shown

missing_requirements.requirement: If the build/deployment fails again, identify and fix the underlying build or deployment configuration issue so subsequent builds and deployments succeed reliably.
missing_requirements.reason: No specific build/deployment failure is identified and no build/deployment configuration or tooling changes (e.g., dfx config, package scripts, pipeline config) are shown in the diff summary; instead, many application features are added.
evidence: <file-diff>: No modified files; only 19 added files

hallucinated_features.description: Added/implemented a full 3D car controller scene with physics, ground texture loading, lights, fog, keyboard controls, and car settings persistence/UI (settings panel, help overlay, header/footer, loader).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest REQ-7/REQ-8 are about build/deployment retry and fixing build/deploy configuration issues without adding new user-facing features; the diff adds substantial new UI and gameplay/scene code.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced Internet Identity + React Query actor/identity hooks for backend integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-7/REQ-8; also represents additional functionality rather than a narrowly-scoped build/deploy fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new Motoko backend file with an empty actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-7/REQ-8 do not request new backend code; the diff adds a backend canister entrypoint stub without indicating it fixes a deployment issue.
